Class Utils

java.lang.Object
Utils
public final class Utils extends Object
Utility methods working just fine as static methods

    • predToDirection

      public static int[] predToDirection(int[] predecessors, int from)
      Convert a predecessor array to a directions array, to have, for each node, the direction the from node has to ping to access this node
      Parameters:
      predecessors - the list of predecessors from the bellman ford
      from - the starting node
      Returns:
      the directions array
